org.apache.avalon.repository.impl
Class DefaultFileRepository

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.avalon.repository.impl.DefaultFileRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
ArtifactDatabase, Repository
public class DefaultFileRepository
extends Object
implements Repository

A component that provides access to versioned resources based on an underlying file system.

Version:
$Revision: 1.1 $ $Date: 2003/11/24 23:35:44 $

Avalon Development Team

getClassLoader

public ClassLoader getClassLoader(Artifact implementation)
                           throws RepositoryException
Description copied from interface: Repository
Creates a ClassLoader chain returning the lowest ClassLoader containing the jar artifact in the loader's path. The dependencies of the argument artifact jar and an api, spi and implementation attribute on the jar and its dependencies are used to construct the ClassLoaders.

Specified by:
getClassLoader in interface Repository
Parameters:
implementation - the implementation artifact
Returns:
the lowest ClassLoader in a chain
Throws:
RepositoryException - if there is a problem caching and accessing repository artifacts and reading their attributes.
See Also:
getClassLoader(org.apache.avalon.repository.Artifact)

getClassLoader

                                  Artifact artifact)
                           throws RepositoryException
Description copied from interface: Repository
Creates a ClassLoader chain returning the lowest ClassLoader containing the jar artifact in the loader's path. The dependencies of the argument artifact jar and an api, spi and implementation attribute on the jar and its dependencies are used to construct the ClassLoaders.

Specified by:
getClassLoader in interface Repository
Parameters:
parent - the parent classloader
artifact - the implementation artifact
Returns:
the classloader
Throws:
RepositoryException - if there is a problem caching and accessing repository artifacts and reading their attributes.
